values: To disperse means to scatter everywhere.
I watched the people disperse in all directions to avoid the charging bull.

vt. & vi. (使)散开, 驱散

时 态:  
dispersed, dispersing, disperses 

名 词:  
dispersant

副 词:  
dispersedly

名 词:  
disperser

形容词:  
dispersible
